insights.title: Mysore Soap (+1645% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Mysore sandal soap is experiencing explosive viral demand, with searches jumping from 3,456 to 60,292 weekly. This suggests a renewed consumer interest in traditional Ayurvedic skincare products, potentially driven by social media content or nostalgia marketing.
strategy: Urgently increase Mysore Sandal Soap inventory by 3x to capture demand surge
Improve fillrate from current 71% to 85%+ by prioritizing vendor allocation
Create 'Traditional Indian Soaps' collection featuring heritage brands
insights.confidence_reason: Exceptional growth (+1645%) with strong volume (60K/wk) but low typed search ratio (7%) suggests autosuggest-driven discovery

insights.title: Body Scrubber (+107% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Body scrubbers (exfoliating bath tools) are showing strong demand growth despite severe supply constraints. With only 14% availability, customers actively seeking these products are largely unable to purchase, indicating a massive unmet demand opportunity.
strategy: Address long-term supply issue immediately - current 14% availability is critical
Onboard 3-5 new body scrubber vendors to diversify supply
Feature prominently in Bath & Body category as availability improves
insights.confidence_reason: Strong growth signal but availability crisis (14%) creates uncertainty in true demand measurement

insights.title: Durex (+968% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Durex brand searches have exploded from 2,579 to 27,556 weekly, indicating a strong brand preference shift in the sexual wellness category. Customers are increasingly searching for premium, trusted brands in this sensitive category.
strategy: Expand Durex SKU assortment to include full product range (all variants)
Improve planning/ordering to address availability gaps (currently 79%)
Bundle Durex products in discreet combo packs for higher AOV
insights.confidence_reason: Exceptional brand-specific growth aligned with category-level sales growth (+22%)

insights.title: Panty Liner (+24% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Panty liner searches show consistent upward trajectory with 100% trend stability, reflecting growing mainstream adoption of everyday feminine hygiene products. The 63% availability signals significant fillrate issues leaving demand unmet.
strategy: Prioritize panty liner fillrate improvement - current 63% is below acceptable threshold
Add premium D2C brands like Plush, Nua alongside established players
Create feminine hygiene education content highlighting everyday use benefits
insights.confidence_reason: Stable upward trend with strong category sales correlation (+27% L2 growth)

insights.title: Loofah (+23% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Loofah searches (83K/wk) dominate the bath accessories category but only 14% availability means customers are consistently disappointed. This represents one of the largest supply-demand gaps in Personal Care.
strategy: Resolve long-term supply issue affecting Beauty Accessories (14% availability)
Prioritize loofah as highest-volume term in severely constrained category
Source alternative suppliers and increase vendor diversity
insights.confidence_reason: Very high volume (83K/wk) provides strong signal despite supply constraints

insights.title: Mars Lip Liner (+660% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Mars cosmetics lip liner searches surged from 1,371 to 10,422 weekly. This value-conscious makeup brand is gaining significant traction, likely driven by beauty influencer recommendations and affordable luxury positioning.
strategy: Expand Mars lip liner SKU range (colors, formulations)
Cross-sell with Mars lipsticks and lip glosses for complete lip kit
Feature in 'Budget Beauty Finds' collection alongside other affordable brands
insights.confidence_reason: Strong brand-specific growth with good availability (88%) enables immediate capture

insights.title: Sexual Wellness (+254% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Category-level searches for sexual wellness have tripled, indicating growing comfort with online purchasing in this segment. The shift from embarrassment to convenience-driven shopping represents a significant category maturation.
strategy: Expand sexual wellness assortment beyond condoms to lubricants, toys, accessories
Address planning/ordering issues to improve from 79% availability
Invest in discreet packaging messaging to reinforce trust
insights.confidence_reason: Category-level growth aligns with brand-level signals (Durex +968%)

insights.title: Mehendi (+251% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Mehendi (henna) searches have surged from 4,581 to 16,070 weekly with 100% trend stability. This traditional hair coloring solution appeals to customers seeking natural, chemical-free alternatives and those preparing for festive occasions.
strategy: Expand mehendi assortment including ready-to-use cones and powder forms
Improve availability from 77% with better planning/ordering
Cross-promote with wedding and festive season campaigns
insights.confidence_reason: Strong stable upward trend with category sales growing at 29%

insights.title: L'Oreal Paris (+85% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Premium haircare brand L'Oreal Paris is seeing renewed search interest, indicating customer willingness to trade up for trusted international brands in the competitive shampoo market.
strategy: Ensure complete L'Oreal Paris haircare range availability
Create premium haircare bundles (shampoo + conditioner + serum)
Improve fillrate in Shampoo category (currently 73%)
insights.confidence_reason: Strong brand growth in high-GMV category (INR 7Cr+)

insights.title: Tresemme Shampoo (+84% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Tresemme, a salon-professional brand at mass pricing, is experiencing strong demand growth. Customers are seeking professional-quality haircare without salon visits, a behavioral shift that accelerated post-pandemic.
strategy: Expand Tresemme range to include full professional line (masks, treatments)
Address fillrate issues in shampoo category (73% availability)
Position in 'Salon at Home' collection
insights.confidence_reason: Parallel growth with L'Oreal suggests broad premium haircare trend

insights.title: Nail Clipper (+288% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Nail clipper searches surged from 4,484 to 17,396 weekly. This essential grooming tool category shows customers are increasingly relying on Instamart for everyday personal care replenishment rather than dedicated stores.
strategy: Address severe supply constraint in tools category (57% availability)
Expand nail care tools assortment (files, buffers, cuticle pushers)
Bundle as part of 'Grooming Essentials' kit
insights.confidence_reason: Strong growth aligns with category GMV growth (+32%)

insights.title: Durex Condom (+97% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Specific Durex condom searches nearly doubled, complementing the broader Durex brand surge. Customers demonstrate strong brand loyalty in sexual wellness, preferring established trusted brands for intimate products.
strategy: Ensure full Durex condom variant availability (ultra-thin, flavored, etc.)
Optimize pricing against competition while maintaining brand value
Cross-promote with other Durex products for basket building
insights.confidence_reason: High volume (58K/wk) with stable upward trend provides reliable signal

insights.title: Price Drop Search (+33% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Searches for 'price drop' indicate customers actively seeking deals and discounted products. This price-sensitive behavior in pharma/wellness suggests opportunity for promotional campaigns and value packs.
strategy: Create dedicated 'Price Drop' collection with discounted wellness items
Improve fillrate in Basic Pharma (62% availability creating poor experience)
Implement price drop alerts for high-intent customers
insights.confidence_reason: High typed ratio (25%) indicates strong intentional search behavior

insights.title: Gillette Blade (+59% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Gillette razor blade searches are growing steadily with 100% trend stability. Male grooming customers show strong brand loyalty for shaving essentials, preferring trusted quality over experimentation.
strategy: Ensure comprehensive Gillette blade inventory (all cartridge types)
Create shaving subscription or multi-pack value options
Cross-sell with shaving cream, aftershave for complete routine
insights.confidence_reason: High volume (44K/wk) with stable growth and aligned category sales (+25%)

insights.title: Aloe Vera (+102% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Aloe vera product searches doubled, reflecting continued consumer interest in natural, soothing skincare ingredients. This versatile ingredient appeals across demographics for face care, sunburn relief, and hair conditioning.
strategy: Expand aloe vera product range (gels, moisturizers, masks)
Address planning/ordering issues in Face and Lip Care (66% availability)
Position in 'Natural Skincare' and 'Summer Essentials' collections
insights.confidence_reason: Strong growth with stable trend and category alignment

insights.title: Pilgrim Serum (+96% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: D2C skincare brand Pilgrim is seeing strong serum-specific searches, indicating growing consumer sophistication in skincare routines. Customers are moving beyond basic cleanse-moisturize to active ingredient-based regimens.
strategy: Ensure full Pilgrim serum range availability (Vitamin C, Retinol, Hyaluronic)
Cross-sell with Pilgrim cleansers and moisturizers for complete routine
Feature in 'K-Beauty Inspired' or 'Serums for Every Concern' collections
insights.confidence_reason: Strong brand-specific growth with stable upward trend

insights.title: Moisturising Cream (+94% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Moisturising cream searches nearly doubled, showing winter skincare needs driving demand. The stable upward trend indicates this is sustained behavior rather than a spike, as customers establish hydration routines.
strategy: Stock deep for winter moisturizer peak season
Feature rich, intensive moisturizers for dry skin concerns
Cross-promote with face oils and overnight masks
insights.confidence_reason: Strong volume and growth with good availability (79%)

insights.title: Ghar Soaps (+52% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Ghar Soaps brand is gaining traction with searches growing 52% MoM. This indicates customer interest in regional/artisanal soap brands that offer differentiated formulations compared to mass-market options.
strategy: Expand Ghar Soaps SKU assortment if currently limited
Position alongside heritage brands like Mysore Sandal
Improve soap category fillrate (currently 71%)
insights.confidence_reason: Good volume (31K/wk) with accelerating growth trend

insights.title: Simple Face Wash (+83% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Simple (the sensitive skin brand) face wash searches grew 83%, reflecting demand for gentle, fragrance-free skincare. Customers with sensitive skin actively seek brands that prioritize skin-friendly formulations.
strategy: Ensure complete Simple face wash range availability
Create 'Sensitive Skin' collection featuring Simple and similar brands
Cross-promote with Simple moisturizers and cleansers
insights.confidence_reason: Stable upward trend with excellent availability (87%)

insights.title: Bandage (+75% MoM)
insights.consumer_insight: Bandage searches grew 75%, indicating Instamart becoming a go-to for first-aid essentials. Quick delivery of wound care products offers clear value proposition over planned pharmacy visits.
strategy: Expand first-aid assortment (bandages, antiseptics, pain relief)
Improve planning/ordering in Wound Care category (66% availability)
Create 'First Aid Essentials' bundle for household stocking
insights.confidence_reason: Strong growth aligns with category sales growth (+23%)
